"Arms Refiners":
"Arms Refiners are special items needed to Limit Break weapons. You can trade for them at the Item Lab using the Upgrade Material Exchange, and obtaining one will cost you the following:
・Stragment A x10
・Stragment B x10
・Stragment C x10
・N-Excube x1
※Stragment A-C are dropped by powerful enemies, such as Megalotix or enemies in High Rank sections."
